ygData.subject: Re: I'm a mob magnet...
ygData.msgSnippet: The monk abilities seem to be huge taunts as well. Since they are right there you shouldn t have any problems.  Whenever I m in a party with a monk I rarely
ygData.messageBody:
The monk abilities seem to be huge taunts as well.

Since they are right there you shouldn't have any problems. Whenever I'm in
a party with a monk I rarely get hit.

> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> i have never had a MOB run for me, when in a party with a monk and a
> cleric. i stand back, cast whirl and choke and feckless might, and whirl
> over and over, and i never get touched even when whirl wears off...
>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

--
Destine "Education makes a people easy to lead, but difficult
Bret Guillet to drive; easy to govern but impossible to enslave."
destine@... - Lord Brougham
Programmer
